summary:
There is a side-channel attack against YubiKey access tokens that allows someone to clone a device.  It’s a complicated attack, requiring the victim’s username and password, and physical access to their YubiKey—as well as some technical expertise and equipment. 
Still, nice piece of security analysis...
title: YubiKey Side-Channel Attack

summary: I wanted to offer a quick follow-up to my post congratulating Marco Arment on the rewrite of Overcast, his podcast app.  It’s hard to imagine you being in this corner of the blog-and-podcast-osphere and not hearing about Overcast’s 10th anniversary relaunch and how the removal and changing of specific features rubbed a lot of users the wrong way.  It certainly tarnished (but I’d argue didn’t obviate) Overcast’s sterling reputation...
title: Humility Is Better Late Than Never
